title: Shopify Product & Landing Page Specialist
job_overview:
Job Overview:

We’re looking for a Shopify VA highly skilled in Photoshop and landing page building to handle:

-Shopify product listing and catalog management
-Theme and product page edits
-Building and editing landing pages using Replo (or similar tools)
-Advanced Photoshop editing for product images
-AI image generation for product visuals
-Creating and editing graphics for ads, product pages, and marketing
-Miscellaneous Photoshop and graphics tasks
-Providing clear updates and documentation to the team

Requirements:
-Proven Shopify management experience (2+ years preferred)
-Strong Photoshop skills (product photo editing, composites, graphics cleanup)
-Experience using Replo or other landing page builders
-Familiarity with AI tools for image generation
-Good written English for product listings
-Detail-oriented, organized, and reliable
-Able to work independently and follow instructions

To Apply:
Send a link to your CV and portfolio (Shopify stores, landing pages, and graphics work).

Use subject line: “Shopify Specialist Application”
